net.kuujo.vertigo.cluster

Interface Cluster

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalCluster, RemoteCluster

    public interface Cluster
    The cluster is the primary interface for deploying Vertigo networks. Clusters handle deploying network coordinators which handle deployment and monitoring of network component instances.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

      • shutdown

        void shutdown(NetworkContext context,
            org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Void>> doneHandler)
        Shuts down a network, awaiting a result.
        Parameters:
        context - The network context.
        doneHandler - An asynchronous result handler to be invoked once the shutdown is complete.
